channel.title: Glossaries on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Glossary
item.description: Budget Consumption This value indicates, for a project, the percentage of the budget days already used. This is calculated by comparing timesheet hours and budget days. Expected Value This value indicates the estimated value of a project, weighted on its probability. Revenue Pipeline This value is the sum of all the pipeline projects’ expected value. Production Value This value indicates *how much a project has produced *at a specific moment in time.
